nodes.text: Imroosian was the language of the Imroosian species. The Imroosian Margo greeted the criminal Tobias Beckett in Imroosian on board the First Light yacht on the planet Vandor in 10 BBY.

Imroosian first appeared in the 2018 Anthology Series film, Solo: A Star Wars Story. It was first identified as Imroosian in the video "Every Language in Star Wars" which released in 2019 on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel.
